parameters.name: workspaceID
parameters.description: Workspace ID where the template is being created.

name.description: Name of the template being created.

blockList.description: Array containing the details of the blocks or processors.

blockName.description: Name of the block in the template.

blockType.description: Type of process executed by the block corresponds to the name parameter in the response from the GET processor API.

blockOrder.description: Order in which the block is created. It defines the linking between the blocks.

items.example: 'Record Reader' is invalid because Record Reader is required

get.summary: Retrieve Blocks Supported by the Template
get.description: Fetches the blocks supported by the DIY template

description.example: OAuth based Intouch Transaction Add V2
